thread.title: Power Rangers Star Faces Up To SIX YEARS In Prison For Killing Roommate!
thread.title_full: Power Rangers Star Faces Up To SIX YEARS In Prison For Killing Roommate!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Power Rangers Star Faces Up To SIX YEARS In Prison For Killing Roommate!
text:
3/16/2017 9:18 PM ET | Filed under: Icky Icky Poo • Legal Matters • Violence 
Don't do the crime if you can't do the time! 
As we reported in 2015 , former Power Rangers star Ricardo Medina Jr. was arrested for fatally stabbing his roommate — Josh Sutter — WITH A SWORD! 
Related: Becky G Will Star In A Power Rangers Reboot! 
According to prosecutors, the two got into an argument about Medina's girlfriend, and it eventually escalated into a deadly attack. 
Fast forward to Thursday, the actor pled guilty to voluntary manslaughter in a Lancaster, CA courtroom and faces up to six years in prison. 
Although the 38-year-old was originally arrested on suspicion of murder, Medina avoided that charge which carries a sentence of 26 years to life in jail. 
He will receive his punishment on March 30.
